name: Neocore
tag_list: collaboration, communication, realtime, chat, audio, video
overview: The Neocore AC allows a group of people to view, discuss and interact with images, videos and documents in a collaborative manner, entirely in real time with Chat and Audio between all participants. Thus, it is possible to exchange information and new knowledge, get second opinion on a particular subject and also training through distance education, and generate cost savings on to face meetings (tickets, transportation, lodging, food), among others.
